trans-unit.source: Container for all extended editor logic for properties.
trans-unit.target: Contêiner para toda a lógica de editor estendida para as propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor> class can hold two <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> objects, one for an inline editor and one for an extended editor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor> classe pode conter dois <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> objetos, um para um editor embutido e um para um editor estendido.

trans-unit.source: The inline editor provides a custom interface that appears within the bounds of the `Properties` window, and the extended editor provides an interface that appears in a new window.
trans-unit.target: Os editores fornece uma interface personalizada que é exibida dentro dos limites do `Properties` janela e o editor estendido fornece uma interface que aparece em uma nova janela.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor.InlineEditorTemplate%2A> property returns the XAML template for the visual interface for the inline editor, and the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor.ExtendedEditorTemplate%2A> property returns the XAML template for the extended editor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor.InlineEditorTemplate%2A> propriedade retorna o modelo XAML para a interface visual para o editor embutido e o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor.ExtendedEditorTemplate%2A> propriedade retorna o modelo XAML para o editor estendido.

trans-unit.source: These are typically provided in a ResourceDictionary elsewhere in the project.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, eles são fornecidos em um dicionário de recurso em outro lugar no projeto.

trans-unit.source: You should use the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton> to invoke your custom <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve usar o <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton> invocar personalizados <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor" /> class without specified extended and inline editor <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor" /> sem os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> de editor estendidos e embutidos especificados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> used for the extended pop-up or pinned editor.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> usado para o pop-up estendido ou editor fixado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> used for the inline editor.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> usado para o editor embutido.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor" /> with the specified extended and inline editor <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.ExtendedPropertyValueEditor" /> com os objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> de editor estendidos e embutidos especificados.

trans-unit.source: When used, its <xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext%2A> is set to a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue>.
trans-unit.target: Quando usado, sua <xref:System.Activities.ActivityContext.DataContext%2A> é definido como um <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> used for the extended pop-up or pinned editor.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> usado para o pop-up estendido ou editor fixado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> object used for the extended pop-up or pinned editor.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataTemplate" /> objeto usado para o editor estendido de pop-up ou fixo.
